trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer enkelte celler i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewCell representerer enkelte celler i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente celler i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>samlingen av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Raden og kolonnen for en DataGridViewCell identifisere den cellen plassering i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig celle inneholder data som er spesifikke for raden og kolonnen den finnes.

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Cellen kan tilpasses i en rekke måter ved å angi egenskapene og behandling av hendelser som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>tilordnet av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å styre forekomsten ble returnert fra denne metoden, eller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>som er tilordnet til kontrollen, opprettes en ny forekomst av en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>-egenskapen, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om tilgjengelig objekter, se delen "Aktiv tilgjengelighet" i MSDN-biblioteket på [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>tilordnet av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Endrer kantlinjestilen inndata celle i henhold til de angitte kriteriene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen internt kaller AdjustCellBorderStyle-metode for å finne utseendet til cellekantlinjene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen brukes vanligvis verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen for den `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>verdien støttes ikke som en inndata stil for celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer cellen kantlinjestilen å endre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som brukes til å lagre mellomliggende endringer kantlinjestilen cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en loddrett kantlinje til cellen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en vannrett kantlinje til cellen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verts cellen er i den første synlige kolonnen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verts cellen er i den første synlige raden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den endrede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer bredden på alle marger for forklaringscellen.

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: Standardbredden på cellekantlinjen er én piksler.

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Bruk følgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>verdier for å endre bredden på kantlinjen: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>verdien angir bredden på 0 piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>Eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>verdier øker standardbredden av 1 pikselbredden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>er satt for den cellen eier rad, høyden på rektangelet økes med verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>er satt for den cellen eier kolonnen, på rektangelet bredden økes med verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som margene skal beregnes for.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer bredden på alle marger for forklaringscellen.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den cellen rad blir delt i cellen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ClickUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av den cellen raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vil ikke delt, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> klasse alltid returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr klone-metoden når du avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>klassen og Legg til nye egenskaper i den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter kolonneindeks for denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks for raden som inneholder radoverskriftene har verdien -1.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som inneholder cellen.&1; Hvis cellen ikke finnes i en kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: Henter det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter området innhold for den cellen.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Returnerte rektangelet rapporter klienten koordinater i piksler.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>metode for å få denne verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: For den grunnleggende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>typen denne verdien er <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger det avgrensende rektangelet av cellen i stedet for celleinnholdet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - eller - cellen er en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>egenskapen er mindre enn 0, som angir at cellen er en rad overskriftscelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den cellen raden vil bli delt når innholdet i cellen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The ContentClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ContentClickUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av den cellen raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vil ikke delt, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av den cellen raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hurtigmenyen som vanligvis vises når brukeren høyreklikker cellen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`, henting av verdien for ContextMenuStrip egenskapen hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen for kontrollen, og returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som angitt i behandlingsprogram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen behandlingsprogrammer for hendelsen, henting av verdien for egenskapen ContextMenuStrip returnerer tidligere angitte verdien eller standardverdien for `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen er spesielt nyttig når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser ved angivelse av cellen ContextMenuStrip verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen endres opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>hendelse på den eiende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hurtigmenyer for individuell rader i stedet for å individuell cells ved å angi raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskap eller behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell ContextMenuStrip property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsinnstillingen celle ContextMenuStrip overstyrer raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen overstyrer både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen og raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi `null` for en celle hurtigmenyen imidlertid å hindre at en rad hurtigmeny overstyres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value for a cell in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardverdien for en celle i raden for nye poster.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultNewRowValue property in the base class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DefaultNewRowValue i basisklassen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>returnerer alltid `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: However, this property can be overridden in derived cell classes to return other default values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan imidlertid overstyres i avledede celle klasser som skal returneres andre standardverdier.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is displayed if the cell is in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av denne egenskapen vises hvis cellen i raden for nye poster.

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName> event when focus enters the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan overstyres av et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelse når fokus skriver inn raden for nye poster.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the default value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer standardverdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner cellen for redigering kontrollere fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> calls this method when the current cell hosts an editing control and editing mode ends.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kaller opp denne metoden når gjeldende celle er vert for en kontroll og redigere modus endene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>, and then removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>, og fjerner den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>samlingen av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This cell is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne cellen er ikke knyttet et <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> has a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> har verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: This is the case, for example, when the control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilfellet, for eksempel når kontrollen ikke er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om cellen vises på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether a particular cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå om en bestemt celle er rullet på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A> property value is `false`, this property will return `false` as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>egenskapsverdi `false`, skal returnere egenskapen `false` samt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen er på skjermen eller delvis på skjermen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den cellen raden vil bli delt når du dobbeltklikker cellen.

trans-unit.source: The DoubleClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DoubleClickUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av den cellen raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som sendes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vil ikke delt, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> klasse alltid returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende, formatert verdien i cellen, uansett om cellen er i redigeringsmodus, og verdien er ikke lagret.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer den gjeldende verdien i cellen eller redigere kontrollen hvis cellen i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ellers henting av verdien for egenskapen konverterer celleverdien til en tilsvarende verdi av typen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Dette opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>som du kan behandle tilpasse verdien konverteringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis formatering mislykkes, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er noe behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen eller behandlingsprogrammet angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende, formatert verdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - eller - cellen er en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>er mindre enn 0, som angir at cellen er en rad overskriftscelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formatering mislyktes og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll eller behandlingsprogrammet som er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrolltypen den cellen vertsbaserte redigering.

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Typen avledede celle overstyrer egenskapen for å returnere kontrolltypen den vertsbaserte redigering.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an editing control, as with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, the EditType property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen ikke har en kontroll for redigering, som med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, returnerer de EditType `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"> </xref> type.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den overordnede raden blir delt i fokus flyttes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The EnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnterUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en brukerhandling flyttet fokus til cellen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis en programmatisk operasjon flyttet fokus til cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vil ikke delt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> klasse alltid returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the error icon for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter grensene for ikonet for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Returnerte rektangelet rapporter klienten koordinater i piksler.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`, verdien for denne egenskapen er <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som beskriver en feilbetingelse som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ErrorText brukes vanligvis under behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>hendelsen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis celleverdien mislykkes noen valideringsvilkår, angi egenskapen ErrorText og avbryte bekreftelsesoperasjonen ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir deretter vises ved den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, og brukeren blir bedt om å rette opp feilen i den cellen data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er `true`, kan du angi feilteksten for rader og celler ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når du tilordner en annen ErrorText streng til en celle, og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>hendelse av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Start med .NET Framework 4.5.2, bestemmes endring av Feilikonet ppt systeminnstillingen når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som beskriver en feilbetingelse som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>metode med `false` som en parameter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-koden kan ikke kalle denne metoden. et objekts `Finalize` metode startes automatisk under datasanering, med mindre finalization av saneringsoppsamlingen er deaktivert av et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i cellen som formatert for visning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>egenskapen er faktiske dataobjektet finnes i cellen, mens FormattedValue er formatert representasjon av dette objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>Egenskaper tilsvarer datatypene for disse verdiene henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for egenskapen kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>til å konvertere celleverdien i en tilsvarende verdi av typen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Dette opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>som du kan behandle tilpasse verdien konverteringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis formatering mislykkes, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er noe behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen eller behandlingsprogrammet angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den formaterte verdien i cellen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis cellen ikke hører til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>er mindre enn 0, som angir at cellen er en rad overskriftscelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.target: - eller - cellen er en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formatering mislyktes og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll eller behandlingsprogrammet som er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den formaterte verdien som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>egenskapen er faktiske dataobjektet finnes i cellen, mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>egenskapen er formatert representasjon av dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>og FormattedValueType egenskaper tilsvarer datatypene for disse verdiene henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen cellen er formatert verdi.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om cellen er låst.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen frosset, avhengig av tilstanden til den cellen overordnede rad- og.

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `Frozen` for raden eller kolonnen er satt til `true`, blir også den cellen frosset egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen er låst; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatert verdien i cellen til Kopier til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente en utklippstavlen-formatert verdi som representerer celleverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Celleverdien hentes først i visningsformatet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan øke det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse til å formatere verdien og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen hvis formatering mislykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen-relaterte parameterne for denne metoden angir hvor denne cellen er plassert i tabell med data som representerer området som er definert av de merkede cellene i de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av den cellen posisjonen, kan ytterligere informasjon om formatering returneres av denne metoden og vise-formatert celleverdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel inkluderer HTML-format for en celle i den første kolonnen i en rad koden som angir starten av en rad.

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Utklippstavlen-formater som støttes inkluderer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area using a default <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style currently in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen området innhold ved hjelp av en standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> og celle stilen for øyeblikket som gjelder for cellen.

trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på innholdet i celle beregnes dynamisk når denne metoden kalles.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementeringen alltid returnerer <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kaller opp denne metoden for å konvertere en celleverdi til en tilsvarende verdi av typen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen sender celleverdien til denne metoden i den `value` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen kan endre både den `value` og `cellStyle` parametere.

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et behandlingsprogram ikke angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`, imidlertid denne metoden formaterer `value` med formatering egenskapene for den `cellStyle` objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not convert `value` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value for values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden ikke konvertere `value` til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdien for verdier som er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>er satt til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>eller `null`.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>til å vise den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Henter arvede hurtigmenyen for den gjeldende cellen.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, it will inherit one from its parents, using the following precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen ikke har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, den vil arve fra de overordnede ved å bruke følgende prioritet: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: This cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: Denne cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The owning row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 3.
trans-unit.target: Eier raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The owning column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 4.

trans-unit.source: The parent table's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName> Shortcut menus are Microsoft Windows native resources whose lifetimes are typically directed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method or the destructor.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede tabellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName>hurtigmenyer er Microsoft Windows opprinnelig ressurser der levetid dirigeres vanligvis av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>metoden eller i ødeleggeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Pass the GetInheritedContextMenuStrip method the row index you used to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir den gjeldende tilstanden til cellen som arvet fra tilstanden til den rad- og.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the state of a cell in a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig å avgjøre statusen til en celle i en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> values of -1, which prevents you from using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedState%2A> property with cells in shared rows.
trans-unit.target: Delt rader har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>verdier-1, som hindrer deg i å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedState%2A>egenskap med cellene i delte rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method, pass in the actual index of the row containing this cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne metoden, kan du sende i faktiske indeksen i raden som inneholder denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the actual index of a shared row by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente den faktiske indeksen for en delt rad ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdiene som representerer den gjeldende tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The cell is not contained within a control and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: Cellen ikke finnes i en kontrollen og rowIndex enn -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is not the index of the row containing this cell.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er ikke indeksen i raden som inneholder denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: The cell is contained within a control and rowIndex is outside the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Cellen befinner seg i en kontrollen og rowIndex er utenfor det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>egenskapen er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property automatically instantiates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> if the property has not previously been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>egenskapen automatisk starter en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>Hvis egenskapen tidligere ikke er åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must use the HasStyle property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property is currently set to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> instance.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor bruke egenskapen HasStyle å finne ut om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>egenskapen er satt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property represent styles set specifically for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å finne ut hvilke egenskaper på objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen representerer stiler angitt spesielt for cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>
