trans-unit.source: Gets the style currently applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen som brukes for øyeblikket til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell InheritedStyle property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen InheritedStyle egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Stiler angitt ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>egenskapen overstyre stiler angitt gjennom alle andre celle-stilegenskaper, men ikke nødvendigvis dokumenter som bidrar til den cellen utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control used to edit the cell.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer kontrollen brukes til å redigere cellen.

trans-unit.source: As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> share a single hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Som en optimalisering-metode, vanligvis alle cellene av samme type og i samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>del én vertsbaserte kontroll for redigering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the InitializeEditingControl method.
trans-unit.target: Før kontrollen er brukt av en celle, må den imidlertid initialiseres av InitializeEditingControl-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Første gang kalles, legger denne metoden til kontrollen i listen over redigere kontroller i overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det også Initialiserer noen av visual egenskapene til cellen.

trans-unit.source: For example, InitializeEditingControl sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel angir InitializeEditingControl bakgrunnsfargen for redigering området som samsvarer med den angitte celle stil-parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to InitializeEditingControl do nothing.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende kall til InitializeEditingControl gjøre noe.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class corresponding to their type.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser bruker denne metoden for vert for en forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen som tilsvarer typen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, a table that contains one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> objects calls this method to add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> editing control to the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en tabell som inneholder én eller flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>objekter kaller opp denne metoden for å legge til en enkelt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>redigering kontrollen eier <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell's location.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte radindeksen for den cellen plassering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value displayed by the cell when editing is started.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer verdien som vises av cellen når redigering startes.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på cellen.

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> or if one is present, it does not have an associated editing control.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke tilknyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> , eller hvis det finnes, den ikke har en tilknyttet kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this cell is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne cellen redigeres.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you are working directly with cell instances.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig når du jobber direkte med celle forekomster.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName> event to determine when the user enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelsen for å bestemme når brukeren skriver inn redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen i redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared if the user presses a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den overordnede raden er delt hvis brukeren trykker en nøkkel under fokus på cellen.

trans-unit.source: The KeyDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden KeyDownUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>med samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumentet har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis raden vil ikke delt, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om redigeringsmodus skal starte basert på den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.target: Overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil opprette en egendefinert celle som redigeres.

trans-unit.target: Det må returnere i avledede klasser `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared when the user releases a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den overordnede raden er delt når brukeren slipper en nøkkel under fokus på cellen.

trans-unit.source: The KeyUpUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden KeyUpUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>med samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumentet har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles i samme tilfeller der en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår, men den ikke heve hendelsen faktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Converts a value formatted for display to an actual cell value.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en verdi som er formatert for skjermen til faktiske celleverdien.

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren redigerer en celleverdi og skriver endringen, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll kaller opp denne metoden hvis du vil konvertere den viste verdien fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen angir underliggende celleverdien eller data kildeverdien konvertere verdien.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne metoden analyserer den `formattedValue` parameteren ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Egenskaper for cellestilen som er angitt av den `cellStyle` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `formattedValue` er lik <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, denne metoden returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>egenskapen eller `null` Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>er <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>og cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>er en referansetype.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method parses `formattedValue` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the specified or default converters.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `formattedValue` er ikke lik <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, denne metoden analyserer `formattedValue` ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>egenskapen og den angitte eller standard konverteringsprogrammer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a <xref:System.Nullable%601> type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>er kan nullstilles, denne metoden bryter returverdien som en <xref:System.Nullable%601>type.</xref:System.Nullable%601> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Visningsverdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the editing control hosted by a cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir plasseringen og størrelsen kontrollens redigering vert en celle i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Some classes derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>, host a control in the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: Noen klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>class, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>, vert for en kontroll i den valgte cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The PositionEditingControl method positions the editing control inside of the host cell.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PositionEditingControl plasserer redigering kontrollen i cellen vert.

trans-unit.source: Because the editing control may take up more space than a single cell, it may need to be positioned differently when editing a cell in the first visible column or first visible row so it does not paint outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi redigering kontrollen kan ta mer plass enn én celle, kan det hende du må plasseres på en annen måte når du redigerer en celle i den første synlige kolonnen eller første synlige raden slik at den ikke fargemerknader utenfor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the control placed as specified by the other arguments; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to place itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kontroll plasseres som er angitt av det andre argumentet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> vil tillate at kontrollen skal plasseres seg selv.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the size; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to size itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi størrelse. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> vil tillate at kontrollen skal skaleres seg selv.

trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på et rektangulært område cellen kan få plass i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The PreferredSize property returns the natural size of the cell computed by the cell's owning row and column.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PreferredSize returnerer naturlig størrelsen på cellen beregnet av cellen eier rad- og.

trans-unit.source: PreferredSize returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1 if the cell is not contained in a table.
trans-unit.target: PreferredSize returnerer en <xref:System.Drawing.Size>med en bredden og høyden på -1 Hvis cellen ikke finnes i en tabell.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property set to `false`, -1 is returned for the width.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>som har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>-egenskapen satt til `false`, returneres -1 for bredde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - eller - cellen er en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's data can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den cellen data kan redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly-egenskapen angir om dataene som vises i cellen kan redigeres.

trans-unit.source: You can set ReadOnly for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi ReadOnly for individuelle celler, eller du kan gjøre en hele raden eller en kolonne med celler skrivebeskyttet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en celle overordnede rad- eller er satt til skrivebeskyttet, som standard får underordnede cellene samme verdi.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior by setting ReadOnly for individual cells.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne standardvirkemåten ved å angi ReadOnly for individuelle celler.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gå til en skrivebeskyttet celle, og du kan angi en skrivebeskyttet celle skal gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: ReadOnly only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly påvirker bare om en celle kan redigeres; den påvirker ikke om brukeren kan slette rader.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's data cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den cellen data ikke kan redigeres. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no owning row when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen eier rad når du angir denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: -or- The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: - eller - eier raden deles ved angivelse av egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om cellen kan endres.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Resizable property is set by the cell's parent row or column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen størrelsen er angitt av den cellen overordnede rad- eller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell can be resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen kan endres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: When the RowIndex property returns -1, the cell is either a column header, or the cell's row is shared.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen RowIndex returnerer -1, cellen er enten en kolonneoverskrift, eller den cellen rad deles.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder cellen.&1; Hvis det finnes ingen eier rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell has been selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om cellen er valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell has been selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen har blitt valgt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke tilknyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> når du angir denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: -or- The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: - eller - eier raden deles ved angivelse av egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: Celleverdi til angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent .
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn eller lik antallet rader i overordnet .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>er mindre enn 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på cellen.

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the Size property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen ikke er knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollere størrelsen egenskapen returnerer en <xref:System.Drawing.Size>med en bredde og høyde-1.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> set to the owning row's height and the owning column's width.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> satt til de eier radhøyden og eier kolonnebredden.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Raden som inneholder cellen er en delt rad.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - eller - cellen er en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the Style property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Stiler angitt gjennom stilegenskapen overstyre stiler angitt gjennom alle andre celle-stilegenskaper, men nødvendigvis ikke dokumenter som bidrar til den cellen utseende.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The style associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Stilen som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet som inneholder ytterligere data om cellen.

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Enhver type utledet fra den <xref:System.Object>klassen kan tilordnes denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Tag property is commonly used to store data that is closely associated with the value displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Tag brukes vanligvis til å lagre data som er nært tilknyttede med verdien som vises av cellen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om cellen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Verktøytipsteksten som er forbundet med denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen vises som cellen verktøytips når musepekeren holdes over cellen ikke og egenskapsverdien <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.String>, the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen <xref:System.String>cellen viser et verktøytips som inneholder verdien i cellen hvis verdien er avkortet i cellen visningen; ellers, cellen vises ikke et verktøytips.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også hindre visning av verktøytips ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ToolTipText property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`, henting av verdien for ToolTipText egenskapen hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>hendelsen for kontrollen, og returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som angitt i behandlingsprogram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ToolTipText property returns the previously specified value or its default value of <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen behandlingsprogrammer for hendelsen, returnerer henting av verdien for egenskapen ToolTipText tidligere angitte verdien eller standardverdien for <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ToolTipText value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>hendelsen er spesielt nyttig når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser ved angivelse av cellen ToolTipText verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen endres opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>hendelse på den eiende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Verktøytipsteksten som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som beskriver gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise noted, the ToString method for all the various cell types will return a string of the form shown in the following code example: `Classname {RowIndex = #, ColumnIndex = #}`
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke annet returnerer metoden ToString for alle ulike celle typer en streng på formen vises i følgende kodeeksempel:`Classname {RowIndex = #, ColumnIndex = #}`

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som er forbundet med denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different value to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når du tilordner en annen verdi til en celle, og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>hendelse av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value er faktiske dataobjektet finnes i cellen, mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>egenskapen er formatert representasjon av dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>Egenskaper tilsvarer datatypene for disse verdiene henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the Value property, the specified value is not automatically converted from a formatted, display value to an underlying cell value.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt egenskapen Value, den angitte verdien er ikke konverteres automatisk fra en formatert vise verdien til en underliggende celleverdi.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> in effect for the cell is ignored, so setting Value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not result in a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>som gjelder for cellen ignoreres, så setter du verdien til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke føre til en egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data to be displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dataene som vises av cellen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*> is outside the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*>er utenfor det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>er mindre enn 0, som angir at cellen er en rad overskriftscelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datatypen for verdiene i cellen.

trans-unit.source: If the ValueType property for the cell has not been set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the owning column is used, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen verditype for cellen ikke er angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for kolonnen eier som brukes hvis den finnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>egenskapen er faktiske dataobjektet finnes i cellen, mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>egenskapen er formatert representasjon av dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ValueType and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Verditype og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>Egenskaper tilsvarer datatypene for disse verdiene henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the data type of the value in the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer datatypen verdien i cellen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is in a row or column that has been hidden.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om cellen er i rader og kolonner er skjult.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the cell is in a row or a column with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om cellen er i en rad eller en kolonne med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A>-egenskapen satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not indicate whether the cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: Den angir ikke om cellen er rullet på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a cell is visible within the display area of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå om en celle skal vises i visningsområdet av kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
